scripts.init-project: npm run init:npm-install && npm run init:dirs && npm run init:files && npm run init:gitignore
scripts.init:dirs: mkdirp sass css vendor images js
scripts.build: npm run biuld:sass && npm run build:autoprefixer && npm run test
scripts.build:sass:dev: node-sass --output-style expanded source-map true -o css sass
scripts.watch:sass: node-sass --output-style expanded source-map true -o css sass --watch
